column2: nailtechmama, 35-44 Female
column9: Just to let you all know. I called the manufacturer, of Levbid & Levsin, Alaven Pharmaceuticals, www.alavenpharm.com  to ask why they were discontinuing it. I just got mt RX of Levbid, which is the same as Levsin, but it's a higher dose & time released. Just be patient...at least we know that we can still get it!! I have no idea how the Levbid will work for me as I was taking Levsin, but I have a feeling it will be better for me.

column2: about to give up, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have had a sharp pain in my left flank that suddenly appears at the most random times.  It is so bad that I can't walk, it wakes me from a sound sleep, and I have even thrown up from the pain.  I have been to every kind of doctor and have spent thousands of dollars on tests all to show normal.  I have had this pain for 12 years.  All doctors have blamed it on my Endometriosis until I had a complete Hysterectomy last year and the pain has continued.  I thought I was going nuts until my doctor decided to give Levbid a shot thinking that I may have a spastic colon.  After a couple of days I noticed a world of a difference!  I have always used Lortab or Percocet which then gave me even worse bowel problems and I was not sure what was worse the pain or both.  I have not taken pain meds in over a month and I am just taking Levbid.  For me this is the "miracle drug" I have been looking for!  If you have tried everything I suggest giving this a shot!
